  \text{agree}_{\mu^{(r)}} \left(f^{(r)}, V^{(r)}\right) & =  \mathbb{E}_{g^{(r)} \in \mathcal{D}^{(r)}}\left[ \mu^{(r)}(g^{(r)}) \right] \\
